text: tavada minisāṭa yam hāniyak sparśa vū viṭa ohu tama paramādhipati veta yomu vī ohuṭa kannalav karayi. pasu va ohuṭa ohugen vū yam anugrahayak pirinæmū viṭa ohu mīṭa pera kavara deyak veta kannalav karamin siṭiyē da eya amataka koṭa allāhgē mārgayen nomaga yavanu piṇisa ohuṭa samānayan tabayi. “oba obē dēva pratikṣēpaya samaga svalpa kālayak bhukti vidinu. niyata vaśayenma oba (nirā)ginnē sagayin aturini” yæyi (nabi muhammad,) oba pavasanu
